TopicTitle: Soft land on jool. With no parachutes

Articles.Content:
My challenge is for you to land on jool using only rockets

PICTURES OR IT DIDN'T HAPPEN:sticktongue:
Note - it can be unmanned or manned
Um, the atmosphere is so thick that you fall at about 10 m/s, and the gravity is only .8 g. Also, there is no surface.
Also, according to the rules about posting challenges, you also have to post your attempt...

Impossible, chutes or none. There is no surface to land on.

Bill suffered the same fate as the probe above soon after going through the surface.
Not possible, Jool has no surface, and any craft that tries to land on it, explodes.

Not impossible, but highly improbable and is mostly based on luck.

I landed there once, at a height of 97 meters, it was stable for a while. As soon as Jeb got out, everything went wrong.
